tasks.text: Cook pasta according to package directions

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat
Add pancetta and cook until crispy, about 5-7 minutes
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheeses, and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture
Add pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper

tasks.text: Heat wok and begin stir frying

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Slice chicken and marinate with soy sauce and cornstarch for 15 minutes
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through, about 5 minutes
Remove chicken and set aside
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Return chicken to the pan
Add oyster sauce and stir to combine
Drizzle with sesame oil
Garnish with green onions and serve over rice
